title: Iñupiat Heritage Center: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes          Admission to Inupiat Heritage Center  Adults  18-59yrs  $10.00    College Students $5.00  Youth  7-17yrs $5.00    Elders free    Children  6 & under  free    NSB Residents  free       Inupiat Heritage Center Facility Rental The Center's facilities are available for rent from 8:30 AM to 10:00 PM. We have a large meeting space known as the 'multipurpose room.' That room can be split in half and the smaller side is called the 'classroom'.    Multipurpose room rates  $50.00 an hr  $175.00 per ½ day 3.5 hrs or more  $350.00 per day beyond 6 hrs    Classroom rates  $75.00 per ½ day 3.5 hrs or more  $100.00 per day beyond 6 hrs
